text: The Paradine Case is an American 1947 courtroom thriller drama movie. This is about a lawyer who falls in love with a woman being accused of murder. Gregory Peck plays a lawyer. Ann Todd plays Gay. Alida Valli plays the woman accused of murder. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1948. The movie received mixed reviews from critics. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1947 thriller movies Category:1947 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Alfred Hitchcock
title: The Paradine Case
